name: Oh No! Kobolds!
description:
Live another day farming carrots and working from the comfort of your tree-home? Or perhaps embark on a whimsical and glorious journey! 

Play as Buster, a tinkering bunny equipped with a hand crafted carrot powered bazooka - that you get to wield for your own protection! 

While exploring the world, fend off hordes of kobolds who show up with the sole purpose of stealing your inventions. Maybe even a boss...

Suitable for

Oh No! Kobolds! is suitable for children from 8 years old and up, but is also aimed at all fans of the good old action exploration games like Ratchet and Clank, Crash Bandicoot and Banjo-Kazooie.

Button layout

Gamepad is recommended.

Concept Art Booklet

Get a look at some of the artworks and sketches created during development. 

Download below.

Version

This version consists of the tutorial level. We have plans for more levels, weapon customization, more enemies as well as a heart warming story. Nah, it is going to be silly and fun.

Made in Unity. 

The Team

We are a team of 10 artists and programmers with a common goal of creating a silly and colorful adventure. The project and about all of the assets have been made from scratch - character models, foliage, textures, animations, shaders, systems, AI and UI to name a few!
